description:
Luffy and the Straw Hats are ready for their next adventure, but before they can move on they must await the return of Usopp - and avoid a barrage of cannon balls courtesy of Garp!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Departing the City of Water! Usopp Mans Up and Brings Closure to the Duel
Départ de la métropole aquatique ! Usopp termine son duel comme un homme !
Shukkou Mizu no Miyako! Otoko Usopp Kettou no Kejime
Прощай, Город Воды! Честь и гордость Усоппа
مغادرة مدينة الماء! يضع الرّجل أوسوبّ خاتمة للنّزال!
出港水の都! 男ウソップ決闘のケジメ
